messages.subject: Recent website additions
messages.msgSnippet: I put the first installment up of Kyoto s Most Wanted please feel free to contribute any text or images you d like to see.
messages.messageBody:
I put the first installment up of Kyoto's Most Wanted please feel free
to contribute any text or images you'd like to see.

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/crossovers.htm

Last week I also uploaded some more images to the Facts section, pics
we've gathered of Shinsengumi members and also some of their belongings,
their burial places etc.

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/photos.htm

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
